amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the environmental protection research under the Department of the Navy by striking the funding in the amount of $21,714,000 and applying the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in the Congressional Record to transfer $21,714,000 from Research, Development, Test and Evaluatio to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
